snippet: A woman and her 11-day-old son were found unconscious in their Brooklyn home on Thursday morning and were later pronounced dead.
lead_paragraph: A woman and her 11-day-old son were found unconscious in their Brooklyn home on Thursday morning and were later pronounced dead.

headline.main: No Clues in Deaths of Brooklyn Mother and Infant
headline.print_headline: No Clues in Deaths of Brooklyn Mother and Infant
